name: Haunted Theme
css:
/* i really want this to be global */
ins.adsbygoogle,span.arrow{display:none!important}@font-face{font-family:Roboto;src:local('Roboto'),local('Roboto'),url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/roboto/v15/mErvLBYg_cXG3rLvUsKT_fesZW2xOQ-xsNqO47m55DA.woff2) format('woff2')}*{font-family:Roboto!important}body{font:1em Roboto,sans-serif}.messageUserBlock a.username{font-weight:700;text-align:center}.username .style10,.username .style9{font-weight:lighter;letter-spacing:.3px;font-size:11px}.messageUserBlock div.avatarHolder,h3.userText{background:#252525}.username .style10{color:#FFA700!important;background:url(https://i.imgur.com/uvC2qqq.gif)}.messageUserBlock h3.userText{padding:3px}.userBanner.wrapped span{position:absolute;top:-6px;width:9px;height:4px;background-color:inherit}.messageUserBlock div.avatarHolder .onlineMarker{position:absolute;top:-2px;left:-2px;border:7px solid transparent;border-top-color:#FF8306;border-left-color:#FF8306;border-radius:0}div#exposeMask{background-color:#0a1b33!important}.messageUserBlock a.username{display:block;padding-bottom:5px}.messageUserBlock .userTitle{font-size:11px;text-align:center;display:block;margin-bottom:6px}.hasJs .Notices.PanelScroller,a.OverlayTrigger.Tooltip{display:none!important}em.userBanner.bannerPrimary.wrapped:after{content:" Member"}.username .style11{color:rgba(0,0,0,.66)}.messageUserBlock .userBanner{font-size:11px;padding:7px;border:1px solid #FAB752;color:#fff;background:#f9c667;background:-moz-linear-gradient(top,#f9c667 0,#ff7f00 100%);background:-webkit-linear-gradient(top,#f9c667 0,#ff7f00 100%);background:linear-gradient(to bottom,#f9c667 0,#ff7f00 100%)}.messageUserBlock .extraUserInfo{background-color:#EDEDED;border:1px solid #DFE3EE;padding:8px;border-top:none}.messageUserBlock .extraUserInfo dl{margin:2px 0 0;color:#FF8306}.messageUserInfo{width:140px}.messageText{padding-left:40px}.message .messageMeta{padding:15px 45px 5px}.message .likesSummary{margin-left:39px}.messageUserBlock div.avatarHolder .avatar{text-align:center;padding-top:9px}.username .style9{color:#000}#taigachat_full .DateTime{font-size:11px;float:right}#taigachat_box li{border-bottom:1px solid rgba(10,206,178,.17);padding:4px}.taigachat_avatar img{margin-right:6px}#taigachat_full #taigachat_box{height:560px;border:5px solid #FFF!important;outline:#B6C2E4 solid 1px;background:rgba(201,243,240,.18)!important}.textCtrl{padding:3px;margin-bottom:2px;-webkit-border-radius:1px;-moz-border-radius:1px;-khtml-border-radius:1px;border-radius:1px;border:1px solid #E4E4E4}.ugc a:link,.ugc a:visited{text-decoration:underline;font-style:normal;font-weight:400}#taigachat_full .taigachat_messagetext{font-style:normal;font-size:12px}.taigachat_motd{border:none;outline:0}.dark_taigachat_full .taigachat_motd{border:3px solid transparent;-moz-border-image:-moz-linear-gradient(left,#3acfd5 0,#3a4ed5 100%);-webkit-border-image:-webkit-linear-gradient(left,#3acfd5 0,#3a4ed5 100%);border-image:linear-gradient(to right,#3acfd5 0,#3a4ed5 100%);border-image-slice:1;padding:17px;background:#F3FBFD;font-size:13px;text-align:center;margin:0;-webkit-box-shadow:0 10px 6px -6px #777;-moz-box-shadow:0 10px 6px -6px #777;box-shadow:0 10px 6px -6px #777}#taigachat_inchat{font-style:normal;color:#1E1E4C;margin-right:3px}span#taigachat_motd{color:#D40000!important}#taigachat_full #taigachat_message{padding:7px;background:#C9F3F0}#taigachat_toolbar,#taigachat_toolbar>*{vertical-align:top;height:100%;width:13%}#taigachat_full #taigachat_toolbar{width:31%}#taigachat_send{height:30px}#taigachat_full #taigachat_box .username{font-style:normal;font-size:12px}.username .style2,.username .style4{font-size:11px;font-weight:lighter;letter-spacing:.3px}.xenForoSkin .taigachat_bbcode_color{width:35px;height:31px}.taigachat_bbcode img.mceIcon,.taigachat_bbcode span.mceIcon,.taigachat_bbcode_smilie{width:35px}input#taigachat_message:active,input#taigachat_message:focus,input#taigachat_message:hover{-webkit-box-shadow:-2px 0 31px -5px rgba(0,0,0,.35);-moz-box-shadow:-2px 0 31px -5px rgba(0,0,0,.35);box-shadow:-2px 0 31px -5px rgba(0,0,0,.35);border:1px solid #0ACEB2}.username .style2{color:#828282}.ugc a:focus,.ugc a:hover{color:#9C0012;background:0 0}.ugc a:link,.ugc a:visited{padding:0 3px;margin:0 -3px;-webkit-border-radius:none;-moz-border-radius:none;-khtml-border-radius:none;border-radius:0}.emCtrl:focus,.emCtrl:hover,.ugc a:focus,.ugc a:hover{text-decoration:underline;-webkit-box-shadow:none;-moz-box-shadow:none;-khtml-box-shadow:none;outline:0}.username .style4{color:#15B131!important;background-image:url(https://i.imgur.com/wbaBsZv.gif)}.pageWidth{max-width:95%}.secondaryContent{padding-bottom:0}.profilePage .mast .section.infoBlock h3,.sidebar .section .secondaryContent h3{font-size:12pt;color:#00D4BF;background:#1e1e4c;padding:6px 10px;margin-bottom:12px;border-top:2px solid #09bda3}.sidebar .section .secondaryContent h3 a{color:#00D4BF}ol.listInline{padding-left:7px;padding-bottom:10px}.messageUserBlock h3.userText{background:-moz-linear-gradient(top,#fff 0,#f6f6f6 47%,#ededed 100%);background:-webkit-linear-gradient(top,#fff 0,#f6f6f6 47%,#ededed 100%);background:linear-gradient(to bottom,#fff 0,#f6f6f6 47%,#ededed 100%)}.messageUserBlock div.avatarHolder{-webkit-box-shadow:0 14px 13px -10px rgba(214,214,214,1);-moz-box-shadow:0 14px 13px -10px rgba(214,214,214,1);box-shadow:0 14px 13px -10px rgba(214,214,214,1);background:#252525;border-radius:0;border:1px solid #000}.username .style3{color:#4169e1;font-style:oblique;font-size:11px;font-weight:lighter;letter-spacing:.3px;background:url(https://i.imgur.com/RAhfemp.gif)}.prefix.prefixGray,.prefix.prefixGreen,.prefix.prefixOrange,.prefix.prefixRoyalBlue{font-size:10px;color:#FFF;padding:1px 4px;text-transform:uppercase}.prefix{background:0 0}.prefix.prefixGreen{background-color:#FFA400;border-color:#EAAE63}.prefix.prefixGray{background-color:#f44;border-color:red}.prefix.prefixRoyalBlue{background-color:#a400ff;border-color:#A400FF}.prefix.prefixOrange{background-color:#48D600;border-color:#00D210}.titleBar h1{font-size:12pt;overflow:hidden;zoom:1;font-weight:700;text-transform:uppercase}.prefix.prefixSkyBlue{color:#FFF;background-color:#ff44b4;border-color:#E400FF;text-transform:uppercase;font-size:10px;padding:1px 4px}.userBanner.bannerPrimary.wrapped span,.userBanner.bannerRoyalBlue.wrapped span,.userBanner.bannerStaff.wrapped span{background-color:#FF9604;border-top:1px solid #FAB752}.messageUserBlock .userBanner:last-child{margin-bottom:0;margin-top:8px}.bbCodeQuote{border-color:#e4e4e4;overflow:auto}.bbCodeBlock .type{color:#8b9dc3;background:#F6213A}.bbCodeQuote .attribution{color:#FFF}.bbCodeQuote .quoteContainer{background:#F1F1F6}b{font-weight:400}.navTabs{background-color:#1e1e4c;border:none;padding-bottom:5px;padding-top:2px}.navTabs .navTab.PopupClosed .navLink{color:#00d4bf;font-size:12px}.navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks{background:#3c3c6d}.navTabs .navTab.selected .navLink{color:#fff;background:#3C3C6D;border:none;border-top:2px solid #00D4BF;box-shadow:0 1px 8px #000;text-shadow:none;font-weight:400;font-size:12px!important}.navTabs .navTab.PopupClosed:hover,.navTabs .navTab.PopupOpen .navLink{background:rgba(30,30,76,.95);color:#00d4bf;font-size:12px;text-shadow:none}.blockLinksList a,.blockLinksList label{color:#00d4bf;border-bottom:1px solid rgba(0,212,191,.17)}.Menu .secondaryContent{background-color:#242552}.Menu{border:1px solid #1e1e4c;border-top:none;box-shadow:0 5px 15px rgba(136,136,136,.35)}.blockLinksList a:hover{background-color:#1E1E4C}.prefix.prefixYellow{color:#FFF;background-color:#000FC3;border-color:#1000FF;text-transform:uppercase;font-size:10px;padding:1px 4px}#header{background-color:#262663;background-image:none}div#logo{content:url(http://i.imgur.com/NO9W5HN.png);margin:10px 0}div#logo:hover{content:url(http://i.imgur.com/caOq6cP.png)}#content .pageContent{margin-top:10px;box-shadow:0 3px 14px rgba(255,255,255,.51)}.taigachat_bbcode_smilie{background:url(http://i.imgur.com/iTfkDeT.pngQG.webp) center no-repeat}.navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks a:focus,.navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks a:hover{color:#FFF;background-color:rgba(30,30,76,.37);border-radius:0!important;text-shadow:none;border:none}.Popup .PopupControl.PopupOpen{color:#3f516a;background:rgba(0,0,0,.06)}.navTabs .navTab.selected .xengalleryTabLinks .xengallery li .Popup a:hover{color:#FFF;text-decoration:none;background-color:#007DFF;border:none}.nodeList .categoryStrip{border-top:3px solid #3c3c6d;background:#1e1e4c;padding:8px 10px;border-radius:0}.nodeList .categoryStrip .nodeTitle a{color:#00D4BF;font-weight:400;letter-spacing:.5px}.node .unread .nodeText .nodeTitle{font-weight:400}.node .unread .nodeIcon:before{color:#1E1E4C;font-size:21px}.node .nodeIcon{margin:1px 0 0 10px;float:left}div#content{background:#3C3C6D}.footer .pageContent{color:#afbdd4;background-color:#1E1E4C;margin-bottom:10px;padding:10px}footer{background:#262663}#copyright{color:#9C0012;float:left}.button:hover,.buttonProxy:hover .button,.button[href]:hover{color:#000;text-decoration:none;background-color:rgba(255,177,0,.57);border-color:#FFE19E #FBCF6F #FFC95B}.xenOverlay.memberCard{background:#0a1b33;top:44.2px!important;box-shadow:0 0 15px 0 rgba(255,255,255,.8)}.prefix.prefixLightGreen{color:#FFF;background-color:#00dc3a;border-color:#D0FFC0;text-transform:uppercase;font-size:10px;padding:1px 4px}.navPopup .PopupItemLinkActive{margin:0 -8px;padding:5px 8px;border-radius:0;background-color:#F6F6F6}a.Messenger_OpenConversationPopup{display:none}.navPopup .listPlaceholder ol.secondaryContent{padding:0}.navPopup .listPlaceholder{overflow:hidden;padding:0 5px}.sectionFooter a{color:#FFC23A}.button{color:#FF8300}span.taigachat_bbcode_smilie:hover{background:url(http://i.imgur.com/P0g80zU.png) center no-repeat}.userBanner.bannerGreen.wrapped span{background-color:#FF9604;border-top:1px solid #FAB752}p.userBlurb,ul#ProfilePanes{font-size:13px}.textWithCount.subHeading .count{margin:0;padding:0;-moz-border-radius:5px;-khtml-border-radius:5px;border-radius:0;border:none;background-color:rgba(31,27,56,0);color:#FFCA1E}.sectionFooter{background:#ECC334;color:#1E1E4C}.primaryContent{border-bottom:1px solid #dfe3ee!important}.primaryContent a{color:#07907c;font-size:12px;font-weight:400}.primaryContent a:hover{color:#ce0a26}.taigachat_activity{color:#1B172F}a.callToAction span{font-weight:400;font-size:12px;color:#FFF;background:#00D4BF;padding:0 16px;-webkit-border-radius:2px;-moz-border-radius:2px;-khtml-border-radius:2px;border-radius:0;display:block}a.callToAction{background:#c9f3f0;padding:2px;border:1px solid #00D4BF;-webkit-border-radius:2px;-moz-border-radius:2px;-khtml-border-radius:2px;border-radius:0;display:inline-block;line-height:20px;-webkit-box-shadow:1px 1px 5px rgba(0,0,0,.15);-moz-box-shadow:1px 1px 5px rgba(0,0,0,.15);-khtml-box-shadow:1px 1px 5px rgba(0,0,0,.15);box-shadow:1px 1px 5px #bbb;outline:0;vertical-align:top;height:20px}a.callToAction:hover span{background-color:#0ACEB2}div#copyright:after{content:" | Modified by HauntedHearts";color:#FFF}.message .newIndicator{text-transform:uppercase;color:#FFF;background:rgba(255,184,59,.99);border:1px solid #FE8E15;box-shadow:1px 1px 3px #ffd275}.breadcrumb .crust a.crumb>span{color:#0ACEB2;text-transform:uppercase}.message .signature{font-size:8pt;color:#666;margin:5px 0 0 40px;border-top:1px dashed #DCDCDC}.message .messageMeta{margin-bottom:9px}.message .messageText>:first-child{margin-top:9px}.userBanner.bannerOlive.wrapped span{background-color:#FF9604;border-top:1px solid #FAB752}.alerts .alertText{font-size:12px}.sidebar .visitorPanel .username{font-weight:400;font-size:11pt;color:#1E1E4C}.breadcrumb{border:1px solid #0ACEB2}.footerLegal a{color:#FFF!important}.subHeading{background:#ecc334}ul.footerLinks a{color:#fff!important}a.prefixLink:hover .prefix{color:#F44;text-decoration:none;background-color:#f7f7f7;padding:0 6px;border:1px solid #F6213A}.xenOverlay.memberCard .userInfo h4{color:#00d4bf;font-size:10pt;margin-bottom:4px}.xenOverlay.memberCard .userInfo h3 a{color:#FFF}.xenOverlay.memberCard .userInfo .userBlurb{font-size:11px;margin-bottom:7px}.pairs dt,.pairsColumns dt,.pairsInline dt,.pairsJustified dt,.pairsRows dt,body .muted,body .muted a,body a.muted{color:#B7B7B7}.xenOverlay.memberCard .userLinks a{margin-right:10px;color:#FFF;white-space:nowrap;font-weight:400;text-decoration:underline}.xenOverlay.memberCard .userLinks{margin-top:10px;border-bottom:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.14)}.xenOverlay.memberCard .lastActivity{border-top:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.14)}.subForumsPopup .dt{color:#9C0012}.secondaryContent{outline:0;border:none;background:rgba(5,204,181,.21)}.avatar .img.m,.avatarHolder img,.navTab .accountPopup img,.profilePostListItem .avatar img,.sidebar .visitorPanel .avatar img,.taigachat_avatar img{border-radius:50%}.navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks a{font-size:11px;color:#fff;padding:1px 10px;display:block;line-height:22px;text-shadow:none}.discussionList .sectionHeaders{background:url(http://www.phcorner.net/styles/default/xenforo/gradients/category-23px-light.png) top repeat-x #FFE77C;border-top:1px solid #FFDC45;border-bottom:1px solid #FFDC45}.PageNav a.currentPage,.PageNav a:focus,.PageNav a:hover{color:#FFF;background-color:#04CBB3;border-color:#17FFDE;position:relative}.discussionListItems .unread .lastPostInfo .username,.discussionListItems .unread .title a{font-weight:400}.sidebar .avatarList .avatar img{width:32px;height:32px;border-radius:50%}.Menu .sectionFooter{background-color:#fff;padding-top:13px}#AccountMenu .statusPoster textarea{padding:5px 0;background:#C9F3F0}#AccountMenu .statusPoster textarea:active,#AccountMenu .statusPoster textarea:focus,#AccountMenu .statusPoster textarea:hover{border:1px solid #FFC23A}.tabs li a,.tabs.noLinks li{color:#212121;background:#ecc334;border:1px solid #dfe3ee;font-weight:400!important}.breadcrumb .crust:last-child a.crumb,.event .content .primaryText,.heading,.xenForm .formHeader,strong.accountUsername.hiddenResponsiveNarrow{font-weight:400}.profilePage .tabs.mainTabs li a:hover{background-color:#FFE978;text-decoration:none}.formPopup .controlsWrapper{background:url(http://www.phcorner.net/styles/default/xenforo/gradients/category-23px-light.png) top repeat-x #C8F2EF}.navPopup .avatar img{border-radius:50%}.navPopup .PopupItemLinkActive:hover{background-color:#fff1d2}.breadcrumb .crust:hover a.crumb{background-color:#C9F3F0}.pairs dt,.pairsColumns dt,.pairsInline dt,.pairsJustified dt,.pairsRows dt{color:#B7B7B7;padding-bottom:3px}#QuickSearch{right:10px;top:-116px;background-color:rgba(255,255,255,0)}.formPopup .primaryControls{zoom:1;white-space:nowrap;word-wrap:normal;padding:6px 5px}.formPopup{width:250px;background-color:#f9f9f9;border:1px solid #fff}.avatar .img.s{width:44px;height:44px;border-radius:101%;background-position:center}.profilePage .tabs.mainTabs{padding:0 20px;margin-top:-23px;min-height:23px;height:auto;position:relative;background:#C9F3F0}.heading,.xenForm .formHeader{font-size:11pt;color:#f7f7f7;background-color:#ECC334}.tabs li:hover a,.tabs.noLinks li:hover{text-decoration:none;background-color:#FFC600}.navigationSideBar .secondaryContent{font-weight:400;font-size:12px}.navigationSideBar a:hover{background:url(http://www.phcorner.net/styles/default/xenforo/gradients/xcategory-23px-light.png.pagespeed.ic.8taOrs_bYo.webp) top repeat-x .categoryName{font-size:19px;margin-top:10px;color:#00D4BF}.smilieList .smilieText{text-align:center;background-color:#1E1E4C;border:1px solid #3C3C6D;color:#00D4BF}.smilieList .smilieText:hover{background-color:#1E1E4C;border-color:#ECC334;color:#00D4BF}
